examples.korean: The government forces launched a major operation to suppress[subjugate] bandits. 발음듣기 관병들은 대대적인 산적 토벌 작전에 나섰다 Neungyule
examples.english: The government forces launched a major operation to suppress[subjugate] bandits. 발음

examples.korean: I believe Bruce Dawe wrote “Search and Destroy” with this idea in mind. 발음듣기 나는 부루스 도어즈씨가 이런생각으로 "수색과토벌"을 썼다고 믿습니다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 하늬바람(gree****) Web Collection
examples.english: I believe Bruce Dawe wrote “Search and Destroy” with this idea in mind. 발음
